scenes.visual: Tight close-up of a cluttered, bare-walled bedroom corner — clothes on a chair, boxes on the floor, no storage in sight. Shot is slightly moody, handheld feel. Text overlay slams on screen.
Wide shot of the same room — cramped, generic wardrobe pushed against the wall, mismatched furniture. Camera slowly pans across the chaos.
scenes.voiceover: This bedroom had the same square footage it always did. The problem wasn't the space — it was what was being done with it.

scenes.visual: Timelapse sequence: our workshop team measuring and cutting panels, close-up of smooth-grain timber being routed, hands fitting soft-close hinges, units being loaded into a van branded with Unicorn Renovations. Cut to on-site: in-house team assembling floor-to-ceiling wardrobe panels, precision fitting around ceiling coving, close-up of internal pull-out drawers being slid into place, LED strip lights being fitted inside the unit. Text overlay appears mid-sequence.
scenes.text_overlay: Built in our workshop. Fitted by our team.
scenes.voiceover: Every piece is built to measure in our own workshop — then installed by the same team who made it. No subcontractors, no strangers in your home. Just craftsmen who take it personally.

scenes.visual: Slow cinematic reveal — camera starts at the floor and glides upward along the finished floor-to-ceiling fitted wardrobe. Warm internal lighting glows from inside open panels. Neatly organised interiors visible. Cut to a wide shot of the transformed bedroom — clean, calm, considered. Owner walks in frame, opens a drawer effortlessly, smiles.
scenes.voiceover: Same room. Same square footage. Smarter space — and a 1-year craftsmanship warranty on every piece we make.

scenes.visual: Unicorn Renovations logo fades in on a clean white or deep charcoal background. WhatsApp CTA text appears beneath it.
scenes.text_overlay: WhatsApp us for a free consultation

voiceover_full: This bedroom had the same square footage it always did. The problem wasn't the space — it was what was being done with it. Every piece is built to measure in our own workshop — then installed by the same team who made it. No subcontractors, no strangers in your home. Just craftsmen who take it personally. Same room. Same square footage. Smarter space — and a 1-year craftsmanship warranty on every piece we make.

caption.story: The most common thing we hear after a joinery fit-out? 'I can't believe I lived without this.' This bedroom didn't need knocking down or extending — it needed smarter built-in storage, designed around how the owner actually lives. In 2026, that's the renovation conversation Dubai homeowners are having: not bigger, but better.
caption.detail: This floor-to-ceiling fitted wardrobe was designed, built in our own workshop, and installed entirely by our in-house team — from first measurement to final soft-close hinge. Bespoke joinery starts from AED 35,000, and you'll receive a 48-hour quote and daily WhatsApp photo updates throughout your project.
caption.cta: Ready to stop wasting wall space? WhatsApp us for a free consultation and let's design something built for your life → https://wa.me/971526455121
